snippet.title: Deadly Premonition 2 | PC Trailer | Future Games Show June 2022
snippet.description:
Enjoy this new trailer announcing Deadly Premonition 2: A Blessing in Disguise is now out on Steam. Expect open-world action-adventure gameplay as you solve murder cases in an small American Mountain town, created by Japanese developer Rising Star Games.

Our Socials - YouTube: www.youtube.com/GamesRadar
Twitter: www.twitter.com/FutureGamesShow
Facebook: www.facebook.com.GamesRadar
Twitch: www.twitch.tv/GamesRadar
